sqlMap.select:
SELECT T1.BANKCODE, T1.BANKNAME, T1.USEYN, T1.AUXCODE FROM sy_bankmst T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.BANKNAME LIKE '%$BANKNAME$%'
ORDER BY T1.BANKCODE ASC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SY_BANKMST SET BANKNAME = #BANKNAME#, USEYN = #USEYN#, AUXCODE = #AUXCODE#, UPDATEUSER = #UPDATEUSER#, UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE() WHERE BANKCODE = #BANKCODE#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SY_BANKMST ( BANKCODE, BANKNAME, USEYN, AUXCODE, INSERTUSER, INSERTDATE ) VALUES( #BANKCODE#, #BANKNAME#, #USEYN#, #AUXCODE#, #INSERTUSER#, SYSDATE() )
